import React from "react"; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./product.css"; import Chart from "../../components/chart/Chart"; import { productData } from "../../dummyData"; import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function Product() { const location = useLocation(); const productId = location.pathname.split("/")[2]; const product = useSelector((state) => state.product.products.find((product) => product._id === productId) ); return (

Product

{product.title}
id: {product._id}
sales: 5123
{/*
active: yes
*/}
in stock: {product.inStock}
); }
